name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Increases your Mastery by 6,437 for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,207 Agility. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 99,121 Nature damage over 8 sec.

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,449 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
